knimeNode.name: Renderer to SVG
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates SVG cells using a renderer

fullDescription.intro: This node appends a new column that holds SVG images of the rendered content from another column. You may choose any of the existing renderers for the specific column.
fullDescription.option: Select the column from which you want to render values
Select the renderer that should be used to create the SVG images from the selected column

ports.outPort: The output with the additional column containing the rendered SVG images.
